document.full_text: bahraini security forces briefly detained the outspoken head of the country's main human rights group on sunday, days after a crackdown that drove mainly shi'ite protesters off the streets.
document.title: bahrain briefly detains human rights activist
lines_and_colors: bahraini security forces briefly detained the outspoken head of the country's main human rights group on sunday, days after a crackdown that drove mainly shi'ite protesters off the streets.
